item.description:
144th Annual Strawberry Festival Dinner with proceeds benefiting The American Red Cross (Westfield, Ma. chapter where Phyllis is a volunteer). The dinner starts at 6:30 pm. Tickets must be purchased by June 14! Phyllis will buy for those who rsvp and you can pay her back that night. Adults are $15, children $7.50 (and children under 3 are free.) The menu includes ham, turkey, potato salad, their famous corn pudding, tossed salad, rolls & butter, lemonade, coffee and iced tea and for dessert strawberry shortcake made with homemade biscuits, native berries and real whipped cream. HHTC can be listed in the festival program if we order tickets by June 14!

Our meeting time will be 6:00 PM at a private home, so you must RSVP for directions.

Since Phyllis will be paying for tickets for all who RSVP, any no-shows will still be required to pay for their ticket.
item.name: Strawberry Supper
